availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Virginia Garth Stephens. Father of Inez G. Stephens, Emma B. Stephens, Sarah Elizabeth Stephens, and Mattie W. Stephens. Farmer in Fulton County in 1860. Signed a petition to Thomas Bramlette in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, p. 416.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, District 2, p. 229B.
